properties.areaDesc: Natrona County Lower Elevations; Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Wind River Basin; Lander Foothills; Casper Mountain
properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 28 at 2:10PM MST by NWS Riverton WY
properties.description:
This is a special weather statement from the National Weather
Service Office in Riverton.

* WHAT...Periods of snow.

* WHERE...Wind River Basin and Natrona County.

* TOTAL SNOWFALL...A dusting to 2 inches in the lower elevations
with the greatest snow amounts in Natrona County. Localized
higher amounts around 4 inches could occur in Natrona County
including on the south side of Casper and on Casper Mountain.

* WHEN...4 AM to 2 PM Wednesday. The heaviest snowfall is
expected to occur between 6 AM and 10 AM.

* IMPACTS...Slick and hazardous roads are expected in some areas
for the Wednesday morning commute.
